purpose: The purpose of the Legend is to provide a clear and concise explanation of the symbols used on a map, allowing users to quickly understand the information being conveyed and make informed decisions based on that information.
mechanism: The Legend is structured as a visual representation of the various symbols and colors used on the map, along with a brief description of what each symbol and color represents. This allows users to easily identify and understand the information being conveyed, regardless of their background or experience with maps.
